meanings.definition: A fortification consisting of two converging walls with a ditch between them.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers hid behind the tenailles during the battle.
meanings.sent2: The castle was protected by strong tenailles.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel thought the tenailles were a fun maze to explore.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the unyielding tenailles guarding the fortress.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight glinted off the sharp edges of the tenailles, creating a formidable sight.

meanings.definition: A pair of pincers used for handling hot metal.
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith carefully held the glowing metal with his tenailles.
meanings.sent2: She used the tenailles to grip the hot iron securely.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly grabbed the tenailles instead of the tongs to flip the steak.
meanings.sent4: His grip was as firm as the tenailles when he used them to shape the metal.
meanings.sent5: The tenailles were like an extension of his hand, allowing precise control over the molten metal.
